snippet: The best iPad games introduced in 2011 in multiple categories.
abstract: The best iPad games introduced in 2011 in multiple categories.
lead_paragraph: Software companies of all kinds flocked to the iPad last year, and the results were great. (See my list of Top 10 iPad apps for 2011.) But in the gaming category in particular, the iPad attracted even more of the world's accomplished software developers. Here's a list of the 10 best entries from an impressive 2011 vintage, with a nod to various gaming genres.

headline.main: App Smart Extra: Best iPad Game Apps
